articles.title: Wind, solar farms could bring rains to Sahara Desert - ETEnergyworld.com
articles.description: "Previous modeling studies have shown that large-scale wind and solar farms can produce significant climate change at continental scales," said Yan Li, a postdoctoral researcher at the University of Illinois in the US.
